hero.desc: We build intelligent agents and integrate AI solutions for small, medium, and large companies. Improve efficiency, decrease manpower, and automate your workflow.

services.subtitle: We replace repetitive tasks with smart agents, allowing your team to focus on growth and strategy.

terms.title: Terms of Service

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to AI Crafters website. These Terms of Service govern your use of our website and services. By using this website, you agree to these terms in full. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using the website.

company.title: Company Information
company.content: AI Crafters is an Israeli company providing artificial intelligence development services, smart agents, and automation solutions for businesses.

services.title: Service Description
services.content: We provide a variety of services in the field of artificial intelligence:

pricing.title: Pricing and Payments
pricing.content: Prices for our services are determined according to the project scope and specific client requirements. Every price quote will be presented clearly and in writing before work begins. Prices include VAT as required by law. Payment terms will be detailed in the service agreement.

cancellation.title: Engagement Terms and Termination
cancellation.content: Our services are provided under individual service agreements tailored to each client. Engagement terms, timelines, payments, and termination conditions are detailed in the specific service agreement signed with each client. In case of any conflict between these Terms of Service and the service agreement, the service agreement shall prevail.

userRights.title: User Rights and Obligations
userRights.content: When using our website and services, you agree to:
list: Not use the services for illegal purposes
Maintain the confidentiality of your access credentials
Not infringe on intellectual property rights
Cooperate with our team to facilitate service delivery

privacy.title: Privacy and Personal Information
privacy.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Information collected is used solely for providing and improving our services. We do not sell or share personal information with third parties without your explicit consent, except as required by law.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content on the website, including texts, graphics, logos, and software, is the exclusive property of AI Crafters or its licensors. No copying, distribution, or commercial use of the content is permitted without prior written approval.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: Services are provided as-is. We make reasonable efforts to provide quality service, but we do not guarantee specific results. Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid for the specific service.

disputes.title: Dispute Resolution
disputes.content: Any dispute will first be resolved through direct negotiation. If no agreement is reached, the dispute will be brought for resolution in the competent court in Tel Aviv-Jaffa. The applicable law is the law of the State of Israel.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any questions or inquiries regarding the Terms of Service, you can contact us:

terms.amendment13Notice: These Terms of Service were prepared in accordance with Israeli law

careers.title: Join the
careers.subtitle: Build the intelligence that powers the future.

aiEngineer.title: ðŸš€ Senior Software Engineer - AI Agent Expert
aiEngineer.intro: Who are we looking for? We are hiring an exceptional Senior Software Engineer combining deep Full-Stack expertise with pioneering specialization in AI Agents and model-driven workflows. This is a key role for architecting and building sophisticated, scalable AI systems.
aiEngineer.intro2: If you are a software engineer first, who knows how to build robust production systems, but have also invested deeply in understanding AI agents and safely integrating LLMs into Production environments, your place is with us!

req.1: Experience: Minimum 10 years of professional software development experience.
req.2: Languages: Expertise in Python and TypeScript.
req.3: Frontend: Strong development skills with React (Preferred Framework).
req.4: AI Agent & Workflow: Extensive hands-on experience building and orchestrating AI agents with multiple tool integrations.
req.5: AI Prod Experience: Minimum 2 years production experience building AI agents (Not including Low-Code/No-Code).
req.6: Architecture: Deep understanding of Multi-Agent systems and advanced RAG architectures.
req.7: Safety: Experience implementing Guardrails, safety mechanisms, and validation layers.
req.8: SQL: Deep expertise in SQL databases and data modeling.

adv.1: Experience with LangGraph or similar frameworks for agent orchestration.
adv.2: Expertise in cloud infrastructure (AWS, GCP) and Infrastructure-as-code (Terraform).
adv.3: Knowledge in DevOps, Containerization (Docker/Kubernetes), and CI/CD.
adv.4: Experience in LLM Fine-Tuning or Model Evaluation.

apply.label: Apply Now
apply.details: Please attach examples of complex systems you designed, multi-agent workflows you built, and your approach to implementing Guardrails.

seniorDev.title: ðŸ’» Senior Developer - Full Stack
seniorDev.intro: We're looking for a Senior Developer with independent thinking and the ability to lead projects end-to-end. You'll work on advanced AI systems, integrate smart models into real products, and be part of a team that's changing how businesses operate.
seniorDev.intro2: If you love solving complex problems, writing clean and scalable code, and staying at the forefront of technology - this is your opportunity to join a company leading the smart agents industry in Israel.

req.1: Experience: Minimum 5 years of professional software development experience.
req.2: Languages: Expertise in Python and Node.js/TypeScript.
req.3: Full-Stack: Ability to work on Backend and Frontend (React preferred).
req.4: AI Integration: Experience integrating language model APIs (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.).
req.5: Databases: Experience with SQL and NoSQL (PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
req.6: Git & CI/CD: Full proficiency in modern development workflows.

adv.1: Experience building AI agents or RAG systems.
adv.2: Familiarity with LangChain, LangGraph or similar frameworks.
adv.4: Contributions to open source projects or impressive personal portfolio.

apply.label: Apply Now
apply.details: Send your CV and a link to your GitHub or portfolio. We'd love to see projects you've built, especially those involving AI.

juniorDev.title: ðŸŒ± Junior Developer - 3 Years Experience
juniorDev.intro: We're looking for a talented developer with 3 years of experience who wants to grow and develop in the AI world. This is a unique opportunity to learn from the best in the field, work on cutting-edge technologies, and build products that change the market.
juniorDev.intro2: We believe in investing in people. If you have a strong desire to learn, technological curiosity, and the ability to function in a dynamic environment - we'll guide you on the path to becoming a leading AI developer.

req.1: Experience: 3 years of software development experience.
req.2: Languages: Proficiency in Python or Node.js/TypeScript.
req.4: Git: Experience working with Version Control.
req.5: Learning: Strong desire to learn and develop in the AI field.

adv.1: Exposure to AI/ML tools or courses in the field.
adv.2: Experience with React or other modern frameworks.
adv.3: Personal projects or open source contributions.
adv.4: Basic familiarity with language model APIs.

apply.label: Apply Now
apply.details: Send your CV and tell us why you want to enter the AI world. We'd love to see personal projects or code you've written.

salesManager.title: ðŸ“Š Sales Manager - Government Sector
salesManager.intro: We're looking for an experienced Sales Manager with connections and deep understanding of the government and public sector. You'll lead our efforts to bring advanced AI solutions to authorities, government ministries, and public organizations.
salesManager.intro2: This is an opportunity to be part of the AI revolution in the public sector. If you have B2G sales experience, technological understanding, and the ability to build and maintain long-term relationships - we'd love to meet you.

req.1: Experience: 5+ years of B2B/B2G sales experience.
req.2: Public Sector: Proven experience working with government bodies or authorities.
req.3: Technical Understanding: Ability to understand and explain AI solutions to non-technical clients.
req.4: Relationships: Existing connections in the government sector - significant advantage.

adv.2: Familiarity with tender and public procurement processes.
adv.4: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or relevant field.

apply.label: Apply Now
apply.details: Send your CV and mention relevant experience in the government sector. We'd love to hear about significant deals you've closed and the relationships you've built.
